column4: Hey. Anyone here having issues installing linux-backports-modules-2.6.31-18-generic? linux-backports-modules-wireless-karmic-generic depends on it

I'm getting an error saying that linux-backport-modules-2.6.31-18-generic is a virtual package and when I try to install linux-backport-modules-2.6.31-18-generic, it says that there are no candidates.
update package info first , and make sure you have added proper source to the source list
Just updated, but it's possible that the mirror hasn't updated yet.
